name: Satellite Shields
description:
ALIENS! They've come to destroy the Earth! We’ve created 2 satellites that can withstand any hit from lasers, but they only defend two sides of the Earth… but it’s a good thing we've developed a shield that surrounds us to keep us safe from those deadly lasers... we don't think it'll be able to survive more than 3 hits though...

Made in 72 hours for the Benbonk Gamejam #3

Music from zapsplat.com
